Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Repeals a provision of the civil service law relating to resolutions of disputes in the course of collective negotiations with certain deputy sheriffs
Summary: Repeals provisions relating to resolutions of disputes in the course of collective negotiations with certain deputy sheriffs to provide such deputy sheriffs with the same interest arbitration scope as municipal police officers.
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal paragraph (g) of subdivision 4 of section 209 of the civil service law, relating to resolutions of disputes in the course of collective negotiations with certain deputy sheriffs
